technical-data.invention-title: Compression-type radial clutch device with C-shaped joint structure
Dispositif d'embrayage centrifuge de type à compression à structure de jonction en forme de C

address.street: Withers & Rogers LLP 4 More London Riverside

abstract.p: The present invention relates to a compression-type radial clutch device with C-shaped joint structure, in which a C-shaped joint structure assembly (111), which can be bended for displacement, is installed between an active rotary part (101) and a passive rotary part (201) with a radial arrangement means and is driven by the active rotary part (101), a joint axial core of C-shaped joint structure (112) provided for connecting an active arm of C-shaped joint structure and a compression arm of C-shaped joint structure, an outward-expanding spring (114) is installed between the two arms (111, 112), so that a prestressed outward-expanding force is formed between the two arms (111, 112) for performing the angular displacement through bending at difference angles, the other end of the active arm (101) of C-shaped joint structure (111) is connected and fastened on the active rotary part (101); and the other end of the compression arm of C-shaped joint structure is installed with a compression roller (118) which is outwardly expanded through the prestressed force and compressed to be engaged in an inner tooth shaped slot (203) at the passive rotary part (201).

The present invention relates to a compression-type radial clutch device with C-shaped joint structure, in which a C-shaped joint structure assembly (111), which can be bended for displacement, is installed between an active rotary part (101) and a passive rotary part (201) with a radial arrangement means and is driven by the active rotary part (101), a joint axial core of C-shaped joint structure (112) provided for connecting an active arm of C-shaped joint structure and a compression arm of C-shaped joint structure, an outward-expanding spring (114) is installed between the two arms (111, 112), so that a prestressed outward-expanding force is formed between the two arms (111, 112) for performing the angular displacement through bending at difference angles, the other end of the active arm (101) of C-shaped joint structure (111) is connected and fastened on the active rotary part (101); and the other end of the compression arm of C-shaped joint structure is installed with a compression roller (118) which is outwardly expanded through the prestressed force and compressed to be engaged in an inner tooth shaped slot (203) at the passive rotary part (201).

description.heading: (a) Field of the Invention
description.p: The present invention relates to a compression-type radial clutch device with C-shaped joint structure, in which a C-shaped joint structure assembly, which can be bended for displacement, is installed between an active rotary part and a passive rotary part of the radial clutch device with a radial arrangement means and is driven by the active rotary part, a joint axial core of C-shaped joint structure is provided for connecting an active arm of C-shaped joint structure and a compression arm of C-shaped joint structure, an outward-expanding spring is installed between the two arms, so that a prestressed outward-expanding force is formed between the two arms for performing the angular displacement through bending at difference angles, the other end of the active arm of C-shaped joint structure is connected and fastened on the active rotary part; and the other end of the compression arm of C-shaped joint structure is installed with a compression roller which is outwardly expanded through the prestressed force and compressed to be engaged in an inner tooth shaped slot at the passive rotary part; when the rotational kinetic energy source at the active rotary part performs the rotation driving to the active rotary part in a direction opposite to the direction in which the C-shaped joint structure being bended and protruded, the C-shaped joint structure is compressed to move through the active arm of C-shaped joint structure, so that the compression roller installed on the compression arm of C-shaped joint structure is compressed to be engaged on a compression end surface of passive side inner tooth shaped slot so as to drive the passive rotary part; and characterized in that when the active rotary part does not apply the torque to the active arm of C-shaped joint structure in a direction opposite to the direction in which the C-shaped joint structure being bended and protruded, and the passive rotary part drives in a direction the same or opposite to the direction in which the C-shaped joint structure being bended and protruded, the compression roller installed on the compression arm of C-shaped joint structure is compressed to retract through an extended inclined surface of passive side inner tooth shaped slot, so an idle sliding rotation state is formed between the passive rotary part and the active rotary part.
description.heading: (b) Description of the Prior Art
description.p: According to another aspect of the present invention, a compression type radial clutch device is arranged for installation between an active rotary part and a passive rotary part and incudes a C-shaped joint structure comprising an active arm arranged for connection to the active rotary part, a compression arm extending from the active arm and a joint between the arms such that the arms form a C-shaped joint structure, the clutch device further including a compression roller installed on the compression arm for engagement with an inner surface of the passive rotary part and an outward expanding spring installed between the two arms so as to bias the arms outwardly.

In this specification, the term "compression-type centrifugal clutch device" is used. It might be said that this compels the compression roller towards the passive rotary part, and so it might be said that the clutch device is a compelling-type centrifugal clutch device.

heading.b: DETAILED DESCRIPTION OF THE PREFERRED EMBODIMENTS

description.p: The present invention relates to a compression-type radial clutch device with C-shaped joint structure, in which a C-shaped joint structure assembly, which can be bended for displacement, is installed between an active rotary part and a passive rotary part of the radial clutch device with a radial arrangement means and is driven by the active rotary part, a joint axial core of C-shaped joint structure is provided for connecting an active arm of C-shaped joint structure and a compression arm of C-shaped joint structure, an outward-expanding spring is installed between the two arms, so that a prestressed outward-expanding force is formed between the two arms for performing the angular displacement through bending at difference angles, the other end of the active arm of C-shaped joint structure is connected and fastened on the active rotary part; and the other end of the compression arm of C-shaped joint structure is installed with a compression roller which is outwardly expanded through the prestressed force and compressed to be engaged in an inner tooth shaped slot at the passive rotary part; when the rotational kinetic energy source at the active rotary part performs the rotation driving to the active rotary part in a direction opposite to the direction in which the C-shaped joint structure being bended and protruded, the C-shaped Joint structure is compressed to move through the active arm of C-shaped joint structure, so that the compression roller installed an the compression arm of C-shaped joint structure is compressed to be engaged on a compression end surface of passive side inner tooth shaped slot so as to drive the passives rotary part; and characterised in that when the active rotary part does not apply the torque to the active arm of C-shaped joint structure in a direction opposite to the direction in which the C-shaped joint structure being bended and protruded, and the passive rotary part drives in a direction the same or opposite to the direction in which the C-shaped joint structure being bended and protruded, the compression roller installed on the compression arm of C-shaped joint structure is compressed to retract through an extended inclined surface of passive side inner tooth shaped slot, so an idle sliding rotation state is formed between the passive rotary part and the active rotary part.

As shown in FIG 3, in the compression-type radial clutch device with C-shaped joint structure as shown in FIG 1, when the active rotary part (101) performs the driving in a direction (the clockwise direction) opposite to the direction in which the C-shaped joint structure assembly (100) being bended and protruded, and the rotation torque thereof compresss the compression arm of C-shaped joint structure (112) through the bendable C-shaped joint structure (100), the compression roller (118) at the distal end of the compression arm of C-shaped joint structure (112) generates a clockwise compression force to the compression end surface of passive side tooth shaped slot (202) of the passive rotary part (201); and the bending angle of the bendable C-shaped joint structure (100) is in a state to ensure, while the mentioned clockwise compression force being generated, the outward-expanding force generated by the compression arm of C-shaped joint structure (112) to the compression roller (118) at the distal end thereof is larger than the inward pressing force from an extended inclined surface of passive side tooth shaped slot (203) to the compression roller (118), thereby the active rotary part (101) drives the passive rotary part (201) to clockwise rotate.

According to the present invention, the compression-type radial clutch device with C-shaped joint structure further includes the passive rotary part (201) performs over running to the active rotary part (101) in the direction opposite to the direction in which the C-shaped joint structure being bended and protruded, so that an idle rotation state is formed between the active rotary part (101) and the passive rotary part (201);

FIG. 4 is a schematic view showing the operation of the passive rotary part (201) performing over running to the active rotary part (101) in the direction (the clockwise direction) opposite to the direction in which the C-shaped joint structure assemble (100) being bended and protruded, so as to form an idle sliding rotation relative to the active rotary part, according to the present invention.

As shown in FIG 4, in the compression-type radial clutch device with C-shaped joint structure shown in FIG 1, when the passive rotary part (201) performs the clockwise over running to the active rotary part (101) in the direction opposite to the direction in which the C-shaped joint structure assembly (100) being bended and protruded, the compression roller (118) at the distal end of the compression arm of C-shaped joint structure (112) is compressed through the extended inclined Surface of passive side tooth shaped slot (203) of the passive rotary part (201), so the compression arm of C-shaped joint structure (112) is inwardly bended and an idle rotation state is formed between the active rotary part (101) and the passive rotary part (201), when the compression force of the extended inclined surface of passive side tooth shaped slot (203) is no longer provided, the compression arm of C-shaped joint structure (112) is outwardly expanded so as to be recovered through the prestressed force of the outward-expanding recovery spring (114).

According to the present invention, the compression-type radial clutch devices with C-shaped joint structure further include the passive rotary part (201) drives the active rotary part (101) in the direction the same as the direction in which the C-shaped joint structure being bended and protruded, and when the active rotary part (101) does not input the rotational kinetic energy, an idle rotation state is formed between the active rotary part. (101) and the passive rotary part (201);

FIG. 5 is a schematic view showing the operation of the passive rotary part (201) performing the rotation driving in the direction (the counterclockwise direction) the same as the direction in which the C-shaped joint structure assembly (100) being bended and protruded, and the active rotary part (101) does not input the rotational kinetic energy, so as to form an idle sliding rotation relative to the active rotary part, according to the present invention.

As shown in FIG. 5, in the compression-type radial clutch device witch C-shaped joint structure shown in FIG. 1, when the passive rotary part (201) performs the rotation driving in a direction (the counterclockwise direction) the same as the direction in which the C-shaped joint structure assembly (100) being bended and protruded, and the active rotary part (101) does not input the rotational kinetic energy, the compression arm of C-shaped joint structure (112) and the compression roller (118) at the distal end of the compression arm of C-shaped joint structure (112) are inwardly bended trough the compression force of the extended inclined surface of passive side tooth shaped slot (203) of the passive rotary part (201), such that an idle rotation state is formed between the active rotary part (101) and the passive rotary part (201), and when the compression force of the extended inclined surface of passive side tooth shaped slot (203) is no longer provided, the compression arm of C-shaped joint structure (112) is outwardly expanded so as to be recovered through the prestressed force of the outward-expanding recovery spring (114). According to the present invention of the compression-type radial clutch device with C-shaped joint structure, when the active rotary part (101) drives the passive rotary part (201) in the direction (the counterclockwise direction) the same as the direction in which the C-shaped joint structure being bended and protruded, and the active rotary part (101) is in an idle rotation state relative to the passive rotary part (201);

FIG. 6 is a schematic view showing the operation of the active rotary part (101) performing the rotation driving in the direction (the counterclockwise direction) the same as the direction in which the C-shaped joint structure assembly (100) being bended and protruded, so as to form an idle sliding rotation state relative to the passive rotary part (201), according to the present invention.

As shown in FIG. 6, when the active rotary part (101) performs the counterclockwise driving to the passive rotary part (201) in the direction the same as the direction in which the C-shaped joint structure assembly (100) being bended and protruded, the compression arm of C-shaped joint structure (112) and the compression roller (118) at the distal end of the compression arm of C-shaped joint structure (112) are compressed by the extended inclined surface of passive side tooth shaped slot (203) of the passive rotary part (201), and the compression arm of C-shaped joint structure (112) is inwardly bended, so an idle rotation state is formed between the active rotary part (101) and the passive rotary part (201), and when the compression force of the extended inclined surface of passive side tooth shaped slot (203) is no longer provided, the compression arm of C-shaped joint structure (112) is outwardly expanded so as to be recovered through the prestressed force of the outward-expanding recovery spring (114).

According to the present invention of the compression-type radial clutch device with C-shaped joint structure, for enhancing the transmission stability and increasing the transmission torque in practical applications, two or more than two of C-shaped joint structure assemblies (100) having the same joint bending and protruding direction can be installed between the active rotary part (101) and the passive rotary-part (201), so as to synchronously interact with the passive rotary part (201).

FIG. 7 is a schematic structural view showing the compression-type radial clutch device with C-shaped joint structure in which two C-shaped joint structure assemblies (100) having the same bending and protruding direction relative to the passive rotary part (201) being installed between the active rotary part (101) and the passive rotary part (201), according to one embodiment of the present invention.

As shown in FIG. 7, a first C-shaped joint structure assembly (100) and a second C-shaped joint structure assembly (100) are installed between the active rotary part (101) and the passive rotary part (201) ing a radial arrangement, the joint structures of the first C-shaped joint structure assembly (100) and the second C-shaped joint structure assembly (100) are bended and protruded in the same direction, so as to operate between the active rotary part (101) and the passive rotary part (201), and the operation function is the same as the embodiment shown in FIG. 1.

FIG. 8 is a schematic structural view showing the compression-type radial clutch device with C-shaped joint structure in which three C-shaped joint structure assemblies (100) having the same driving direction relative to the passive rotary part (201) being installed between the active rotary part (101) and the passive rotary part (201), according to one embodiment of the present invention.

As shown in FIG. 8, a first C-shaped joint structure assembly (100), a second C-shaped joint structure assembly (100) and a third C-shaped joint structure assembly (100) are installed between the active rotary part (101) and the passive rotary part (201) in a radial arrangement, the joint structures of the first C-shaped joint structure assembly (100), the second C-shaped joint structure assembly (100) and the third C-shaped joint structure assembly (100) are bended and protruded in the same direction, so as to operate between the active rotary part (101) and the passive rotary part (201), the operation function is the same as the embodiment shown in FIG 1.

FIG. 9 is a schematic structural view showing the present invention being installed with a G-shaped joint structure assembly (100) clockwise bended and a C-shaped joint structure assembly (100) counterclockwise bended.

FIG. 10 is a schematic structural view showing the present invention being installed with two C-shaped joint structure assemblies (100) clockwise bended and two C-shaped joint structure assemblies (100) counterclockwise bended.

According to the present invention of the compression-type radial clutch device with C-shaped joint structure, when being applied in practical applications, two or more than two of compression-type radial clutch devices with C-shaped joint structures can be stacked installed on the same axis, and the joint bending directions of the C-shaped joint structure assemblies (100) are opposite (as shown in FIG. 11, which is a schematic view showing two C-shaped joint structure assemblies (100) having different bending directions and stacked on the same axis, according to the present invention); with the structure options of coaxial or separated arrangements of the active rotary part (101) and passive rotary part (201) stacked on the same axis of the individual compression-type radial clutch device with C-shaped joint structure, the applications are as followings:

FIG 12 is a schematic structural view showing a first compression-type radial clutch device with C-shaped joint structure having a clockwise bended C-shaped joint structure assembly (100) and a second compression-type radial clutch device with C-shaped joint structure having a counterclockwise bended C-shaped joint structure assembly (100), wherein the active rotary parts (101) and the .passive rotary parts (201) of the two compression-type radial clutch devices with C-shaped joint structures are coaxially arranged,

As shown in FIG 12, the first compression-type radial clutch device with C-shaped joint structure having a clockwise bended C-shaped joint structure assembly (100) and the second compression-type radial clutch device with C-shaped joint structure having a counterclockwise blended C-shaped joint structure assembly (100) are installed, and the active rotary parts (101) and the passive rotary parts (201) of the two compression-type radial clutch devices with C-shaped joint structures are coaxially arranged, wherein the active rotary part (101) of the first compression-type radial clutch device with C-shaped joint structure and the active rotary part (.101) of the second compression-type radial clutch device with C-shaped joint structure are coaxially operated; the passive rotary part (201) of the first compression-type radial clutch device with C-shaped joint structure and the passive rotary part (201) of the second compression-type radial clutch device with C-shaped joint structure are coaxially operated.

As shown in FIG 13, the first compression-type radial clutch device with C-shaped joint structure having a clockwise bended C-shaped joint structure assembly (100) and the second compression-type radial clutch device with C-shaped joint structure having a counterclockwise bended C-shaped joint structure assembly (100) are installed, and the active rotary parts (101) of the two compression-type radial clutch devices with C-shaped joint structures are coaxially arranged and the passive rotary parts (201) thereof are separately arranged, wherein the active rotary part (101) of the first compression-type radial clutch device with C-shaped joint structure and the active rotary part (101) of the second compression-type radial clutch device with C-shaped joint structure are coaxially operated; the passive rotary part (201) of the first compression-type radial clutch device with C-shaped joint structure and the passive .rotary part (201) of the second compression-type radial clutch device with C-shaped joint structure are separately operated.

As shown in FIG. 14, the first compression-type radial clutch device with C-shaped joint structure having a clockwise bended C-shaped joint structure assembly (100) and the second compression-type radial clutch device with C-shaped joint structure having a counterclockwise bended C-shaped joint structure assembly (100) are installed, and the active rotary parts (101) of the two compression-type radical clutch devices with C-shaped joint structures are separately arranged and the passive rotary parts (201) thereof are coaxially arranged, wherein the active rotary part (101) of the first compression-type radial clutch device with C-shaped joint structure and the active rotary part (101) of the second compression-type radial clutch device with C-shaped joint structure are separately operated; the passive rotary part (201) of the first compression-type radial clutch device with C-shaped joint structure and the passive rotary part (201) of the second compression-type radial clutch device with C-shaped joint structure are coaxially operated.

According to the present invention of the compression-type radial clutch device with C-shaped joint structure, when being applied in practical applications, two or more than two of compression-type radial clutch devices with C-shaped joint structures can be stacked installed on the same axis, and the joint bending directions of the C-shaped joint structure assemblies (100) are the same (as shown in FIG. 15, which is a schematic view showing two C-shaped joint structure assemblies (100) having the same bending directions and stacked on the same axis, according to the present invention); with the structure options of coaxial or separated arrangements of the active rotary part (101) and passive rotary part (201) stacked on the same axis of the individual compression-type radial clutch device with C-shaped joint structure, the applications are as followings:
